entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
